=\ncellpadding=3D"5">\n            <tr>\n              <td valign=3D"top">\n                <!--start content here-->\n\t\t\t\t<font color=3D"#333333" size=3D"2" face=3D"Arial, Helvetica, =\nsans-serif"><strong>\n\t\t\t\t<p>TMXT is a rapidly emerging player in the multi-billion dollar =\nspecialty electronics arena.</p> =20\n\n<p>TMXT\'s heralded product line possesses a myriad of significant =\nperformance, durability and price advantages that appeal to a diverse =\nrange of automotive, boating and trucking segments.</p> =20\n\n<p>Interestingly, according to management, yearly numbers for engine =\nmanufacturing are 12,000,000 for the domestic auto industry and 125,000 =\nfor the marine industry. TMXT estimates the domestic market to be =\nconservatively in excess of $2,000,000,000 for OEM ignition systems.</p> =\n\n\n<p>These projections do not include foreign sales, which are recognized =\nas being approximately double domestic sales. TMXT\'s other products are =\na bit more difficult to project. No other products exist in these =\ncategories so a somewhat conservative approach has been factored in =\nTMXT\'s projections.</p> =20\n\n<p>To project this first year, start-up numbers, TMXT has made several =\nassumptions: TMXT will occupy its new factory with controlled conditions =\nfor sales and production; necessary personnel will be on board; and, a =\ndynamic new marketing phase will be launched for its new products, =\nincluding advertising and promotion.</p>\n\n<p><font color=3D"#006633">Management estimates that in the first year, =\nit is reasonable to expect sales to come approach 4,000 units. Average =\nprice per unit is approximately $650, for gross sales of $2,600,000.  =\nTMXT\'s other products are to contribute approximately $2,000,000 to =\nfirst year sales. Gross profit margins are projected to range from 30% =\nto 75% depending on the order size and purchaser.</font></p>=20\n\n<p><font color=3D"#006633">TMXT projects in the near future to capture =\n3% of the combined projected market. This could equate to sales of =\n$120,000,000.</font></p>\n\n<p>To round out its dazzling display of products and services, TMXT =\nplans to unveil its FLAT PANEL DISPLAY:  Perma-Tune Electronics is =\ncurrently designing a revolutionary new touch-screen, flat-panel pilot =\ninstrumentation display for the marine industry.  The panel will be =\nfully visible in all light conditions, including direct sunlight.</p>=20\n\n<p> A wide variety of engine performance parameters can be =\nsimultaneously monitored by the pilot, while concurrently displaying =\nglobal positioning, sonar and radar data.  This one central display =\nsimplifies the pilot\'s job and un-clutters the dashboard.  Bulky, =\nfailure-prone wiring harness bundles can be eliminated with this =\nproduct, since a single RS-232 computer cable connects the engine =\nmanagement system to the display.</p>=20\n\n<p>Additional devices can be connected with a single RS-232 computer =\ncable.  Indeed, we\'re talking of a highly-fragmented environment, with =\nsuch players as: Crane Ignition Systems, Seamens Ignition Systems, =\nDelphi Ignition Systems, Saab Motor Company, Motorola Ignition Systems, =\nBosh and MSD. TMXT is continuously working with companies and individuals in =\nthe automotive, boating and trucking industries to create and develop =\nstrategic and marketing alliances.</p> =20\n\n<p>Through these types of joint ventures and alliances TMXT believes it =\nwill be able to make immediate and significant inroads into these =\nindustries resulting in significant immediate and long-term revenue =\nstreams for TMXT.</p> =20\n\n<p>While some may say that providing new solutions for ignitions may =\nseem less than exciting, TMXT is well aware that these markets offer =\nTMXT a significant opportunity to sell products and services into =\nmulti-billion dollar industries that are struggling to find =\nsolutions.</p> =20\n\n<p>TMXT\'s products appear to be welcome solutions for the age-old =\nquestion, "How can we get better gas mileage, dependability and torque =\nfrom the internal combustion engine". TMXT signed letters of intents for =\norders totaling=20\n$3 million dollars.</p></strong>\n\n<p><font size=3D"+1"><strong>Trans Max Technologies, Inc. Announces =\nLetter of Intent for $2,000,000 from a Major Motorcycle Aftermarket =\nVendor</strong></font></p>\n=20\n<p>RONKONKOMA, NY: March 29, 2004; Perma-Tune Electronics, Inc., a =\nwholly-owned subsidiary of Trans Max Technologies, Inc., (OTCBB:TMXT), =\ntoday announced the signing of a Letter of Intent with a Major =\nMotorcycle Aftermarket Vendor to distribute Plasmatronics\' (a division =\nof Perma-Tune Electronics, Inc.) Plasma Drive Ignition System.  The =\nLetter of Intent will be converted to an order within approximately 45 =\ndays. The Letter of Intent is for a minimum of 2,000 units and =\nrepresents sales of approximately $2,000,000.</p>=20\n\n<p>The Motorcycle Aftermarket Vendor will be purchasing specially =\nconfigured and manufactured Plasma Drive Ignition Systems. The Plasma =\nDrive Ignition system is a new kind of ignition that can either be used =\nby Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEM) or aftermarket vendors.  Tests =\nshow significant increases in fuel mileage and an increase in horsepower =\nand reducing harmful emissions.  This product is currently in =\nproduction.</p>  =20\n\n<p>Said Lonnie Lenarduzzi, President and Chief Scientist for =\nPlasmatronics, a division of Perma-Tune Electronics, Inc., "To =\nunderstand what we\'ve done with the Plasma Drive Ignition, you must =\nthrow out everything you knew about motorcycle ignition. This =\nrevolutionary compact motorcycle ignition system is a completely new way =\nof achieving incredibly efficient combustion. Using never-before =\nexploited principles of physics, the PDI produces a cleaner burn than =\never before possible, converting nearly all available fuel, whatever it =\nmay be, to torque. This process results in a thrilling, measurable =\nincrease in performance, dramatically better fuel economy and as a =\nresult, reduced emissions."</p>=20\n\n<p>Trans Max Technologies, Inc. and its wholly-owned subsidiary =\nPerma-Tune Electronics, Inc. through its Plasmatronics division is a =\ndevelopmental Company engaged in the automotive and marine electronics =\nindustry and has several cutting edge products that were recently =\nintroduced at the Miami International Boat Show. style=3D"border-collapse:collapse" =\ncellpadding=3D"0">\n\t<!--section-->\n      <tr><!--top-->\n        <td bgcolor=3D"#009966" valign=3D"middle" =\nheight=3D"20">&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong><font width=3D"1"></td>\n      </tr>\n      <tr>\n        <td width=3D"660" bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF" =\nstyle=3D"border-collapse:collapse">\n          <table width=3D"100%"  border=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" =\ncellpadding=3D"5">\n            <tr>\n              <td valign=3D"top">\n                <!--start content here-->\n\t\t\t\t<font color=3D"#333333" size=3D"2" face=3D"Arial, Helvetica, =\nsans-serif"><strong>\n\t\t\t\t<p>TMXT is a rapidly emerging player in the multi-billion dollar =\nspecialty electronics arena.</p> =20\n\n<p>TMXT\'s heralded product line possesses a myriad of significant =\nperformance, durability and price advantages that appeal to a diverse =\nrange of automotive, boating and trucking segments.</p> =20\n\n<p>Interestingly, according to management, yearly numbers for engine =\nmanufacturing are 12,000,000 for the domestic auto industry and 125,000 =\nfor the marine industry. TMXT estimates the domestic market to be =\nconservatively in excess of $2,000,000,000 for OEM ignition systems.</p> =\n\n\n<p>These projections do not include foreign sales, which are recognized =\nas being approximately double domestic sales. TMXT\'s other products are =\na bit more difficult to project. No other products exist in these =\ncategories so a somewhat conservative approach has been factored in =\nTMXT\'s projections.</p> =20\n\n<p>To project this first year, start-up numbers, TMXT has made several =\nassumptions: TMXT will occupy its new factory with controlled conditions =\nfor sales and production; necessary personnel will be on board; and, a =\ndynamic new marketing phase will be launched for its new products, =\nincluding advertising and promotion.</p>\n\n<p><font color=3D"#006633">Management estimates that in the first year, =\nit is reasonable to expect sales to come approach 4,000 units. Average =\nprice per unit is approximately $650, for gross sales of $2,600,000.  =\nTMXT\'s other products are to contribute approximately $2,000,000 to =\nfirst year sales. Gross profit margins are projected to range from 30% =\nto 75% depending on the order size and purchaser.</font></p>=20\n\n<p><font color=3D"#006633">TMXT projects in the near future to capture =\n3% of the combined projected market. This could equate to sales of =\n$120,000,000.</font></p>\n\n<p>To round out its dazzling display of products and services, TMXT =\nplans to unveil its FLAT PANEL DISPLAY:  Perma-Tune Electronics is =\ncurrently designing a revolutionary new touch-screen, flat-panel pilot =\ninstrumentation display for the marine industry.  The panel will be =\nfully visible in all light conditions, including direct sunlight.</p>=20\n\n<p> A wide variety of engine performance parameters can be =\nsimultaneously monitored by the pilot, while concurrently displaying =\nglobal positioning, sonar and radar data.  This one central display =\nsimplifies the pilot\'s job and un-clutters the dashboard.  Bulky, =\nfailure-prone wiring harness bundles can be eliminated with this =\nproduct, since a single RS-232 computer cable connects the engine =\nmanagement system to the display.</p>=20\n\n<p>Additional devices can be connected with a single RS-232 computer =\ncable.  Indeed, we\'re talking of a highly-fragmented environment, with =\nsuch players as: Crane Ignition Systems, Seamens Ignition Systems, =\nDelphi Ignition Systems, Saab Motor Company, Motorola Ignition Systems, =\nBosh and MSD.  Such quality names appear to soon be joined by TMXT as it =\nunveils its unparalleled proprietary technologies.</p>                   =\n=20\n\n\t\t\t\t</strong></font>\n\t\t\t\t</td>\n            </tr>\n        </table>\n\t\t</td>\n      </tr>\n\t  <tr><td><img =\nsrc=3D"http://images.upper-web-side.com/images/Dailygreen/clear.gif" =\nheight=3D"10" width=3D"1"></td>\n\t  </tr>\n      <tr>\n         <td =\nbackground=3D"http://images.upper-web-side.com/images/Dailygreen/bottom_s=\nection.jpg" height=3D"20">&nbsp;</td>\n      </tr>\n    </table>\n=09\n\t    <table width=3D"660" style=3D"border-collapse:collapse" =\ncellpadding=3D"0">\n\t<!--section-->\n      <tr><!--top-->\n        <td bgcolor=3D"#009966" valign=3D"middle" =\nheight=3D"20">&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong><font color=3D"#FFFFFF" =\nface=3D"Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" =\nsize=3D"2">Outlook</font></strong></td>\n      </tr>\n      <tr>\n        <td =\nbackground=3D"http://images.upper-web-side.com/images/Dailygreen/dots.gif=\n" height=3D"1"><img =\nsrc=3D"http://images.upper-web-side.com/images/Dailygreen/clear.gif" =\nheight=3D"1" width=3D"1"></td>\n      </tr>\n      <tr>\n        <td width=3D"660" bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF" =\nstyle=3D"border-collapse:collapse">\n          <table width=3D"100%"  border=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" =\ncellpadding=3D"5">\n            <tr>\n              <td valign=3D"top">\n                <!--start content here-->\n\t\t\t\t<font color=3D"#333333" size=3D"2" face=3D"Arial, Helvetica, =\nsans-serif"><strong>\n\t\t\t\t<p>TMXT is poised to embark on a period of seemingly unbridled =\ngrowth as it furthers its expansion as a leader in electronic ignition =\nand ignition-based products for the automotive, boating and trucking =\nmarkets.  TMXT is continuously working with companies and individuals in =\nthe automotive, boating and trucking industries to create and develop =\nstrategic and marketing alliances.</p> =20\n\n<p>Through these types of joint ventures and alliances TMXT believes it =\nwill be able to make immediate and significant inroads into these =\nindustries resulting in significant immediate and long-term revenue =\nstreams for TMXT.</p> =20\n\n<p>While some may say that providing new solutions for ignitions may =\nseem less than exciting, TMXT is well aware that these markets offer =\nTMXT a significant opportunity to sell products and services into =\nmulti-billion dollar industries that are struggling to find =\nsolutions.</p> =20\n\n<p>TMXT\'s products appear to be welcome solutions for the age-old =\nquestion, "How can we get better gas mileage, dependability and torque =\nfrom the internal combustion engine".   These industries repeat these =\nsame questions, but TMXT might very well have the answers.</p>=20\n\n<p><font color=3D"#006633">With TMXT\'s shares currently trading in the =\n$0.40 range, it seems apparent the financial community has yet to factor =\nin the enormous growth and profit potential of TMXT\'s innovative product =\nintroduction and attractive revenue model.</font></p>=20\n\n<p><font color=3D"#006633">In addition, the Street has left the shares =\nto be unrecognized and undiscovered, as well as undervalued, based on =\nits transition into a powerful growth vehicle.</font></p> =20\n\n<p>Additionally, TMXT intends to make application to a more principal =\nU.S. stock exchange to further attract both retail, as well as =\ninstitutional interest.  With an effective and diversified cutting-edge =\nproduct line, virtual worldwide penetration potential, solid margins, =\nstrong industry backdrop, aggressive marketing plan, modified revenue =\nmodel, outstanding comprehensive customer service, state-of-the-art =\ntechnology, significant competitive advantages and an experienced =\nhands-on management team.</p>=20\n\n<p><font color=3D"#006633">TMXT represents a compelling risk/reward =\nsituation in the lucrative auction site arena.  Our 12-month target for =\nthe shares of TMXT Technologies, Inc. is $1.50&#8212;$2.00, with the =\npotential for strong upside surprises.</font></p>=20\n\n</strong></font></td>\n            </tr>\n        </table></td>\n      </tr>\n\t  <tr><td bgcolor=3D"#009966"><img =\nsrc=3D"http://images.upper-web-side.com/images/Dailygreen/clear.gif" =\nheight=3D"10" width=3D"1"></td>\n\t  </tr>\n      <tr>\n         <td =\nbackground=3D"http://images.upper-web-side.com/images/Dailygreen/bottom_s=\nection.jpg" height=3D"20">&nbsp;</td>\n      </tr>\n    </table>\n\t</td>\n  </tr>\n  <tr>\n  <td>\n  <table cellpadding=3D"10" border=3D"0" =\nstyle=3D"border-collapse:collapse">\n  \t<tr>\n\t        <TD bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><font color=3D"#333333" face=3D"Arial, =\nHelvetica, sans-serif" size=3D"1">=20\n             Important Disclaimer and Information:\n\n                 <br>\n                 <br>\n             Verify all claims and do your own due diligence. infant prosthetic fittings this year, which will create =\nannual<BR>\n&gt;&gt; positive revenue for PDPR of nearly $1.5 million<BR>\n<BR>\n&gt;&gt; The Panhandle Lions Clubs of Texas has teamed up with PDPR to =\nfund Texas<BR>\nchildren in need of a infant prosthetic fittings and are =\nuninsured.&nbsp;<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\nBREAKING NEWS:&nbsp; =\nHanger,<BR>\nInc. currently trades on the (NYSE &quot;HGR&quot;), and has a market =\ncap of approx.<BR>\n$366 million<BR>\n<BR>\n&gt;&gt; Currently PDPR is the only company focusing on the unique needs =\nof<BR>\n&gt;&gt; the infant-pediatric prosthetics segment<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\nPEDIATRIC PROSTHETICS MARKET<BR>\n<BR>\nChildren ages 0 to 14 comprise $100 million of the total $2 billion =\nnational<BR>\nprosthetic market.&nbsp; The vast majority of this pediatric prosthetic =\nmarket<BR>\nderives from infants born with a limb loss.<BR>\n<BR>\nThis infant prosthetic segment allows PDPR to generate a consistent =\nrevenue<BR>\nstream from childhood to adulthood.&nbsp; Revenue from infancy to =\nadulthood is<BR>\nanticipated to be over $200,000, with adults spend an additional =\n$200,000.&nbsp;<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\nMedicaid and other insurance companies will be funding more than 70 =\ninfant<BR>\nprosthetic fittings this year, which will create annual positive revenue =\nfor<BR>\nPDPR of nearly $1.5 million<BR>\n<BR>\n1.      'From: "mohamad zaman" <consultancy991@telstra.com>\nSubject:  PLEASE SAVE OUR SOUL\nDate: Thu, 22 Apr 2004 06:52:17 +0300\nMIME-Version: 1.0\nContent-Type: text/html;\n\tcharset="iso-8859-7"\nContent-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable\nX-Priority: 3\nX-MSMail-Priority: Normal\nX-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2527\n\n<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 3.2//EN">\n<HTML>\n<HEAD>\n<META HTTP-EQUIV=3D"Content-Type" CONTENT=3D"text/html; =\ncharset=3Dus-ascii">\n<META NAME=3D"Generator" CONTENT=3D"MS Exchange Server version =\n6.5.7036.0">\n<TITLE> PLEASE SAVE OUR SOUL</TITLE>\n</HEAD>\n<BODY>\n<!-- Converted from text/plain format -->\n<BR>\n\n<P><FONT SIZE=3D2>Dear Sir/madam,<BR>\n<BR>\nI am Brother Titi Camara, the son of Late Director of Finance, =\nDr.Mohammed Camara of Sierra Leone Diamond and Mining Corporation. I am =\ncontacting you from GHANA.On behalf of my widowed mother Mrs, Mariam =\nCamara wish to solicit your assistance in transferring the sum =\nUS$15.5miilion (fifteen Million Five Hundred Thousand United States =\nDollars only) to your bank account. My late father diverted the above =\nmentioned money meant for the purchase of ammunitions for my country =\nduring the peak of a disastrous war in Sierra Leone The said money was =\nlodged in a Bank in GHANA through the help of the bank manager.After the =\ndeath of my father, we were advised by the Bank Manager to seek the help =\nof a Foreign Partner who can receive this money in our behalf for =\ninvestment purposes.<BR>\n<BR>\nNow the war in Sierra Leone is over with the help of United Nations and =\nECOMOG soldiers, the present government of Sierra-Leone has revoked the =\npassport of all officers who served under the former regime and now ask =\nCountries to expel such person at the same time freeze their account and =\nconfiscate their asset, it is on this note that I am contacting you, all =\nI needed from you is to furnish me with your bank particulars:<BR>\n1. Account name<BR>\n2. Account number<BR>\n3. Bank address, telephone and fax numbers for immediate transfer of the =\nfund into your bank account.<BR>\nI am compensating you with 30% of the total amount, now all my hope is =\nbanked on you and I really wants to invest this money in your country, =\nwere there is stability of Government, political and economic =\nwelfare.<BR>\n<BR>\nHonestly, I want you to believe that, this transaction is real and never =\na joke. The photocopy of the Certificate of Deposit issued to my late =\nfather by the bank on the date of deposit is still intact with us, for =\nyou to be clarified because, I do not expose my self to anybody I see, I =\nbelieved that you will be able to keep this transaction secret for me =\nbecause this money is the hope of our life, hope you understand. Please =\ncontact me immediately you have gone through this mail, fell free and =\nmake it urgent. That is the reason why I offered you 30% of the total =\namount.<BR>\n<BR>\nN/B: As soon as this money is transferred to your account, I shall make =\narrangements to come to your country with my mother for you to advice us =\non a profitable business that we can be able to invest this money =\nbecause I believe you know more that us. Transferring of this money to =\nyour account can take only four (10) working days. As soon as we hear =\nfrom you, we are going to commence action towards transferring this =\nmoney to your bank account.<BR>\n<BR>\nFurther information and arrangements will commence as soon as =\ntrust,confidence and good relationship are established. I shall be most =\ngrateful and appreciative if you could maintain the confidentiality in =\nthis matter even if you don\'t want to assist us. Looking forward for =\nyour respond.Please your reply should be on my alternative =\nemail:(t_camara66@sino.net) for more details.<BR>\n<BR>\nYours faithfully,<BR>\nBRO.TITI CAMARA.<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&=\nnbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&n=\nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nb=\nsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=\np;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp=\n;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n</FONT>\n</P>\n\n</BODY>\n</HTML>\n',

     'From: "saraguei22" <saraguei22@telstra.com>\nSubject:  PROPOSED    ASSISTANCE\nDate: Thu, 22 Apr 2004 18:32:39 +0300\nMIME-Version: 1.0\nContent-Type: text/html;\n\tcharset="iso-8859-7"\nContent-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable\nX-Priority: 3\nX-MSMail-Priority: Normal\nX-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2527\n\n<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 3.2//EN">\n<HTML>\n<HEAD>\n<META HTTP-EQUIV=3D"Content-Type" CONTENT=3D"text/html; =\ncharset=3Dus-ascii">\n<META NAME=3D"Generator" CONTENT=3D"MS Exchange Server version =\n6.5.7036.0">\n<TITLE> . PROPOSED    ASSISTANCE</TITLE>\n</HEAD>\n<BODY>\n<!-- Converted from text/plain format -->\n<BR>\n\n<P><FONT SIZE=3D2>Dear friend,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<BR>\nThis mail may be a surprise to you because you did not give me the =\npermission to do so and neither do you know me but before I tell you =\nabout myself I want you to please forgive me for sending the mail =\nwithout your permission.&nbsp;<BR>\n<BR>\nMy name is Sarah Adidi Guei, 28 years old and the daughter of the late =\nmilitary ruler of Ivory-Coast ( Retired Brigadier General Robert Guei) =\nwho was killed in a political crisis which led to war in my =\ncountry(Ivory-Coast)some weeks ago.My father,mother and two junior =\nbrothers were killed by some soldiers believed to be loyal to the =\ngovernment because of my father\'s objection to some certain policies of =\nthe present government. I was lucky to have escaped with a brother who =\nis the last child of the family that night because we were visiting a =\nfamily friend in another city far away from our home.<BR>\n<BR>\nI have to go into hiding with my junior brother for some days before =\narrangements were made for us to leave Ivory-Coast for the Republic of =\nTogo on the invitation of President Eyadema of Togo who granted us =\npolitical assylum.<BR>\n<BR>\nBefore we left for Togo,I visited our home where my mother and my two =\njunior ones were killed in our village and during the search for some =\ndocuments in my father\'s room came accross some vital documents and the =\nkeys to a secret vault in the house.I took the keys and went down to =\nwhere the vault is and there I discovered two metal boxes which were =\ncarefully hidden. With the aide of the documents I was able to open the =\nboxes only to find out that the boxes were full of money in hundred =\ndollar bills. I could not count the money because I was very shock to =\nsee it and again it is too much for me to count but the documents that I =\ndiscovered in his room which led me to the boxes put the money at =\n$10,000,000:00(ten million dollars).<BR>\n<BR>\nI locked it back carefully and arranged for the boxes to be moved with =\nme through the help of some family friends to Abidjan the capital city =\nwhere I deposited the boxes with a security company for safe-keeping.I =\ndid not declare the content of the boxes to the security company,I only =\ndeclare it as family valuables.<BR>\n<BR>\nWhen the African leaders came to Ivory-Coast and President Eyadema =\ninvited us to go to the Republic of Togo where I now live with my junior =\none.I cannot leave the money there in Abidjan so I am making =\narrangements to move the boxes to Togo where I now live and have the =\nmoney transfered by bank abroad.<BR>\n<BR>\nThis has been my reason for contacting you.<BR>\n<BR>\nI would have given you my telephone number so that you can call me in =\norder to discuss the issue better but I\'m afraid to do so because we =\nhave too many people around us who I would not want to know of the money =\nbut I have a laptop with me all the time and I think it will be better =\nto communicate by Internet untill we can make proper and solid =\narrangements about how to move the money.<BR>\n<BR>\nI wish to meet with you if you can make a trip to The Republic of Togo =\nor Ivory-Coast,then we can meet secretly before we go ahead for the =\ntransaction.Never mind about your expenditure it will be taken care of =\nthough I may not be able to send some money to you right now but I will =\npay it back if you can do it and not only that,I am ready to offer 30% =\nof the money to you for this assistance.It is not that I am paying you =\nbut for your assistance which I shall really appreciate.&nbsp;<BR>\n<BR>\nPlease I wish that this assistance be treated highly confidential.<BR>\n<BR>\nWaiting to read your response about the proposal soonext.<BR>\nplease send your repliy to my privet email address =\nsara_555@fsmail.net<BR>\n<BR>\nThanks.<BR>\n<BR>\nSarah Guei.<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&=\nnbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&n=\nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nb=\nsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbs=\np;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp=\n;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n</FONT>\n</P>\n\n</BODY>\n</HTML>\n',

     'From: "Christina Youngblood" <gzoefak@yahoo.com>\nSubject:  Re: FMNJ: The BULL Market in Metals is Just BEGINNING!! Fri, 12 Mar 2004 10:05:27 -0600\nDate: Fri, 12 Mar 2004 19:04:27 +0300\nMIME-Version: 1.0\nContent-Type: text/html;\n\tcharset="iso-8859-7"\nContent-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable\nX-Priority: 3\nX-MSMail-Priority: Normal\nX-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2527\n\n<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 3.2//EN">\n<HTML>\n<HEAD>\n<META HTTP-EQUIV=3D"Content-Type" CONTENT=3D"text/html; =\ncharset=3Diso-8859-7">\n<META NAME=3D"Generator" CONTENT=3D"MS Exchange Server version =\n6.5.7036.0">\n<TITLE> Re: FMNJ: The BULL Market in Metals is Just BEGINNING!! =\nFri, 12 Mar 2004 10:05:27 -0600</TITLE>\n</HEAD>\n<BODY>\n<!-- Converted from text/plain format -->\n\n<P><FONT SIZE=3D2>OTC FIRST ALERT -&nbsp; NEW Public Company of the =\nMonth<BR>\n<BR>\nSymbol: FMNJ<BR>\nMarket: OTC<BR>\nSector: FMNJ is a gold exploration and mining company<BR>\n<BR>\nThe BULL Market in Metals is Just BEGINNING!! &quot;Which is the better =\nbuy now, technology or mining stocks? Surprise, the winner is mining =\nstocks. Mining stocks have more momentum.&nbsp; Mining companies are in =\nthe early stages of a growth cycle as demand for nickel, copper and gold =\nincreases.&quot; - Jim Jubak, a senior markets editor for MSN Money<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\nFranklin Mining, Inc. (OTC: FMNJ) is a gold exploration and mining =\ncompany.&nbsp; FMNJ has a long 138-year history beginning in the late =\n1860s with the gold strikes in central Colorado - (formerly as Franklin =\nMining Co. and Franklin Consolidated Mining Co.)<BR>\n<BR>\nDue to the recent stable and rocketing Gold prices, FMNJ is again =\ngearing up, acquiring and developing two initial mining properties: the =\nFranklin Mines and Mills in Colorado and the El Alacran Deposit in =\nColombia. These mining projects have major Gold ore body potential, =\nwhich is indicated by exploration results and drilling results.<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\nThe Franklin Mines and Mills in Colorado have multiple claims, existing =\npermits, and a crushing and flotation mill on site.&nbsp; It has a =\nhistory of producing gold, silver, lead, zinc and copper, and the =\npotential to become a small - to medium producer of high-grade gold, =\nsilver and base metals.&nbsp;<BR>\n<BR>\nGeologist Gifford A Dieterle has summarized the mineral valuations of =\nthe Franklin Mines as follows:<BR>\n&nbsp;* Proven/probable Gold mining potential is 58,680 oz, which at =\n$390/oz it equates to over $22.8 million; the Silver potential is =\n1,255,572 oz, which at $6 oz it equates to over $7.5 million<BR>\n<BR>\nThese valuations only take into account the current Gold and Silver =\nvalues that can actually be sampled, additional gold and silver may be =\ndiscovered as mining resumes.<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n&nbsp;&quot;...Gold ascends to $500 an ounce...&quot; this is a =\nprediction made for gold in the year of 2004 - Byron Wien, a US Senior =\nInvestment Strategist with Morgan Stanley.<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\nThe El Alacran Deposit project includes three exploration licenses =\ntotaling 1,265 hectares of known gold, copper and silver resources. =\nGeologist Robert P. Shaw has summarized calculations of gold and copper =\nresources as follows:<BR>\n<BR>\n&nbsp;* Proven Gold underground mining potential is 96,280 oz, which at =\n$390/oz it equates to over $37 million; the proven Copper potential is =\n84,532,577 lbs, which at $1.00/lb it equates to over $84 million.<BR>\n<BR>\n&nbsp;* Possible Gold open pit mining potential is 41,324oz, which at =\n$390/oz it equates to over $16 million.<BR>\n&nbsp;* Possible/probable Gold underground mining potential is 206,610 =\noz, which at $390/oz it equates to over $80 million; the Copper =\npotential is 216,341,000 lbs, which at $1.00/lb it equates to over $216 =\nmillion<BR>\n<BR>\nThe El Alacran ore zones are not constricted, appear to repeat =\nsystematically and are open at depth, which offers possibilities for the =\nexploration, discovery and long-term development of potentially =\nlarge-scale Gold and Copper resources.&nbsp; Silver is also indicated =\nand probably significant but calculations are premature at this =\ntime.<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\nFINAL CONSIDERATIONS<BR>\n<BR>\nWe are still a long way from gold being overvalued and, in the meantime, =\nthere is an awful lot of money to be made in this sector, especially in =\nmineral exploration companies.&quot; - Paul Van Eeden<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\nThe mining potential that FMNJ could extract from these two mines is =\nover $465 million. However that is not enough for FMNJ.<BR>\n<BR>\nFMNJ is continuing to drive ahead and is currently investigating other =\nmineral properties and active precious metal mines in North and South =\nAmerica to:<BR>\n1. Successfully grow its asset base<BR>\n2. Revitalize its operations<BR>\n3. Producing low cost precious and base metals<BR>\n4. To generate a substantial return to its investors!<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\nReceive First Notice on Companies like FMNJ otc@ministration.biz<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\nThe information herein is for information purposes only and should not =\nbe construed as an offer or solicitation of an offer to buy or to sell =\nsecurities. This assembled information is based on information supplied =\nby the company, press releases, SEC filings, or from other sources =\nbelieved to be reliable, but no representation, expressed or implied, is =\nmade as to its accuracy, completeness or correctness. The data contained =\nherein is subject to change without notice. Small-cap companies, =\nmicro-cap companies, penny stocks and/or thinly traded securities are =\ninherently risky and volatile; therefore the risk of losing some or all =\nshould be calculated. Please always do your own due diligence and =\nconsult a financial advisor. Americall accepts no liability for any =\nlosses arising from an investor\'s reliance on or use of this report. =\nAmericall has been paid twelve thousand dollars for the dissemination of =\nthis information. Americall and its affiliates, officers, directors, =\nmembers and employees may hold, buy or sell common shares of profiled =\ncompanies in the open market without notice. On technical analysis may =\nfrom time to time cause the target price to fluctuate without notice. =\nCertain information included herein is forward-looking within the =\nmeaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995, =\nincluding, but not limited to, statements concerning manufacturing, =\nmarketing, growth, and expansion. Such forward-looking information =\ninvolves important risks and uncertainties that could affect actual =\nresults and cause them to differ materially from expectations expressed =\nherein.<BR>\n<BR>\nAmericall - 6 Eftute Ave - Kingston 10 - Jamaca WI<BR>\n<BR>\nTo be removed from our list, please go to <A =\nHREF=3D"http://www.ministration.biz/remove.php">http://www.ministration.b=\niz/remove.php</A><BR>\n</FONT>\n</P>\n\n</BODY>\n</HTML>\n',

     'From: "Xavier Rogers" <zsgmykw7@tu-harburg.de>\nTo: <paliourg@iit.demokritos.gr>\nSubject:  Record sales, profits, earnings, stock price and trading for LETH jylra\nDate: Sat, 13 Mar 2004 17:26:41 +0300\nMIME-Version: 1.0\nContent-Type: text/html;\n\tcharset="iso-8859-7"\nContent-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable\nX-Priority: 3\nX-MSMail-Priority: Normal\nX-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2527\n\n<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 3.2//EN">\n<HTML>\n<HEAD>\n<META HTTP-EQUIV=3D"Content-Type" CONTENT=3D"text/html; =\ncharset=3Diso-8859-7">\n<META NAME=3D"Generator" CONTENT=3D"MS Exchange Server version =\n6.5.7036.0">\n<TITLE> Record sales, profits, earnings, stock price and trading =\nfor LETH jylra</TITLE>\n</HEAD>\n<BODY>\n<!-- Converted from text/plain format -->\n\n<P><FONT SIZE=3D2>Market Mover Stock Report\'s Last Pick (CWTD) exploded =\nfrom $1.19 to<BR>\n$9.20, a gain of over 670% in 5 days (Feb 12 - 17)!!!<BR>\n<BR>\nHere is our NEXT HOT PICK which we feel is the most undervalued =\nstock<BR>\nwe have ever featured and should outperform all other picks this year =\nbased<BR>\non their sales figures (incl. a backlog of over $100 Million), =\nincredibly solid<BR>\nnumbers, and low outstanding share total.<BR>\n<BR>\nLife Energy and Technology Holdings, Inc.<BR>\n(OTCBB: LETH)<BR>\nCurrent Price: 2.45<BR>\nNear-Term Target: 7.00<BR>\nProjected High for \'04: 15.00<BR>\n<BR>\nWe are sending this URGENT INVESTOR BULLETIN REVEALING THE<BR>\nMOST UNDERVALUED STOCK ON THE OTCBB to our millions of<BR>\nsubscribers for substantial profits immediately!<BR>\nSales orders received by LETH exceed $150 Million over the past year<BR>\nwhile major news was just released that adds multi-millions to the =\nbottom<BR>\nline. LETH has experienced a recent spike in price and volume =\nindicating<BR>\nheavy accumulation of shares which is a sign of even bigger things to =\ncome<BR>\nfor this emerging world leader in the conversion of waste materials =\ninto<BR>\nelectrical energy, an industry with such high global demand that it =\nis<BR>\nimpossible to assign a value to the size of the market.<BR>\n<BR>\n(Mar 9 \'04) Urgent News Update:<BR>\nLETH Announces the Sale of Two (2) Biosphere Process Systems to<BR>\nProcura International Limited for $14 Million with an Option for the =\nSale of<BR>\nan Additional 98 Systems Over the Next 24 Months.<BR>\n<BR>\nSolving a Dual Crisis - Waste and Energy:<BR>\n<BR>\nLETH is utilizing the unique proprietary technology of their =\nBiosphere<BR>\nProcess System to generate revenue from the disposal of a wide variety =\nof<BR>\nwaste products at 5 to 7 tons per hour which makes a major impact on =\nthe<BR>\nglobal waste problem. This profitable and environmentally safe =\nprocess<BR>\nconverts into clean, &quot;green&quot; electricity such waste materials =\nas Municipal<BR>\nSolid Waste, agricultural wastes, forestry wastes, medical wastes, =\nindustrial<BR>\nwastes, sewage sludge, shale oil, sour natural gas, and the huge market =\nof<BR>\nused tires. LETH profits from the sale of electricity created from the =\nwaste<BR>\nconversion on a continuous basis by generating 5 to 10 mega-watts per =\nhour<BR>\nof electricity which is then sold to replenish the local or national =\ngrid.<BR>\n<BR>\n(Mar 3 \'04) LETH Release Major Product Delivery and Net Profit News<BR>\nLETH delivered 12 Biosphere Process Systems which resulted in a net =\nprofit<BR>\nof $3.5 Million, the equivalent of .12 cents per share. LETH is =\nscheduled to<BR>\nreceive an additional $7 Million translating into an additional .24 =\ncents per<BR>\nshare which is the balance of this completed contract over the next 6 =\nmonths.<BR>\nThe net profit per share from just this single contract would value the =\nstock<BR>\nabove $6 by calculating the .36 cents per share total at an average =\nindustry<BR>\nPE of 18 - 22.<BR>\n<BR>\nExamining LETH - By The Numbers<BR>\n<BR>\nTotal Assets: 36.8 Million =3D 1.26 per share of assets<BR>\nCash: 23.4 Million =3D .80 cents per share of cash<BR>\nShares Outstanding: 29 million (down from 31.8 million) after 2.8 =\nmillion<BR>\nshares retired in Feb. \'04<BR>\nAdditional Shares to be Retired: 1.3 million per Company press =\nrelease<BR>\nEstimated Shares in Float: 7 million<BR>\nCompleted Biosphere Process Systems Now in Operation: 26<BR>\n<BR>\nRecord Backlog of Sales for LETH:<BR>\n<BR>\nDuring the past year, over 20 additional Biosphere Process Systems =\nhave<BR>\nbeen ordered, which upon completion represents a backlog exceeding =\nover<BR>\n$100 Million in upcoming sales. Many of these contractual agreements<BR>\ninclude options for the purchase of additional Biosphere Systems in =\nthe<BR>\nfuture once the initial order has been completed. The options vary =\nfrom<BR>\nhundreds to thousands of units which would send shockwaves through =\nthis<BR>\nlow-float, emerging industry leader at an average sale price of $7 =\nMillion<BR>\nper Biosphere Process System!<BR>\n<BR>\nLETH\'s Blue Chip Partner - Fortifying the System:<BR>\n<BR>\nLETH is an alliance partner with Tetra Tech, Inc. (NASDAQ: TTEK, $20) =\na<BR>\nleader and one of the largest providers in environmental, mechanical, =\nand<BR>\nelectrical management consulting services primarily for the US =\nGovernment<BR>\nwith annual sales of $800 Million. Tetra Tech will coordinate the =\nsecuring of<BR>\nnecessary permits, installation, and continuous worldwide monitoring of =\nthe<BR>\nBiosphere Process System for LETH. Tetra Tech is now in the process =\nof<BR>\nobtaining Department of Environmental Quality permitting for the<BR>\nBiosphere Process in the state of Louisiana. This is a monumental event =\nfor<BR>\nLETH which opens the floodgates for major project revenues in =\nLouisiana<BR>\nwhile having a parallel effect on LETH stock in the form of a huge =\nnear-<BR>\nterm announcement.<BR>\n<BR>\nStock Set to Explode on Earnings Boom:<BR>\n<BR>\nLETH has the impressive financials and sales already in the pipeline =\nto<BR>\nachieve record-setting stock price levels in support of the =\nCompany\'s<BR>\nbreakout year. The added kicker is that LETH has historically =\nreleased<BR>\n&quot;batches&quot; of very significant news announcements regarding =\nsuccessfully<BR>\ncompleted sales contracts early in the calendar year. We feel that =\npattern is<BR>\nrepeating itself as evidenced by what has just been released with some =\nvery<BR>\nbig surprises still to come. There aren\'t any companies at any price =\nlevel<BR>\nwith the technology or exponential sales growth to match LETH, while<BR>\nsimultaneously containing all the ingredients for major profits as =\nglobal<BR>\ndemand to solve two crisis areas, waste and electrical energy, =\nreaches<BR>\nunprecedented levels.<BR>\n<BR>\nRequired Market Mover Stock Report (MMSR) Information: MMSR<BR>\ncautions that small and micro-cap stocks are high-risk investments and =\nthat<BR>\nsome or all investment dollars can be lost. We suggest you consult a<BR>\nprofessional investment advisor before purchasing any stock. All =\nopinions<BR>\nexpressed on the featured company are the opinions of MMSR. MMSR<BR>\nrecommends you use the information found here as an initial starting =\npoint<BR>\nfor conducting your own research and your own due diligence on the<BR>\nfeatured company in order to determine your own personal opinion of =\nthe<BR>\ncompany before investing. MMSR is not an Investment Advisor, =\nFinancial<BR>\nPlanning Service or a Stock Brokerage Firm and in accordance with such =\nis<BR>\nnot offering investment advice or promoting any investment =\nstrategies.&nbsp;<BR>\nMMSR is not offering securities for sale or solicitation of any offer to =\nbuy or<BR>\nsell securities. MMSR has received twelve thousand dollars from an<BR>\nunaffiliated third party for the preparation of this company profile. =\nSince we<BR>\nhave received compensation there is an inherent conflict of interest in =\nour<BR>\nstatements and opinions. Readers of this publication are cautioned not =\nto<BR>\nplace undue reliance on forward looking statements, which are based =\non<BR>\ncertain assumptions and expectations involving various risks and<BR>\nuncertainties, that could cause results to differ materially from those =\nset forth<BR>\nin the forward looking statements.<BR>\n<BR>\nmb nlz<BR>\n</FONT>\n</P>\n\n</BODY>\n</HTML>\n',

I have urgent and<BR>\nvery confidential business proposition for you. On<BR>\nDecember 29th 2002, an American contractor with the<BR>\nGovernment of Switzerland, Mr. Michael Creek made a<BR>\nnumbered time (Fixed) deposited for twelve calendar<BR>\nmonths, valued at Thirty-five Million dollars<BR>\n(35million) in my branch. Upon maturity, I sent a<BR>\nroutine notification to his forwarding address but got<BR>\nno reply.<BR>\n<BR>\nAfter a month, we sent a reminder and finally we<BR>\ndiscovered from his contract employers, that Mr.<BR>\nMichael Creek died from an automobile accident. I therefore made further investigation<BR>\nand discovered that Mr. Michael Creek did not<BR>\ndeclare any next of kin in all his official documents,<BR>\nincluding his Bank Deposit paperwork. This sum of<BR>\n35million is still sitting in United Bank<BR>\nInternational and the interest is being rolled over<BR>\nwith the principal sum at the end of each year. No one<BR>\nwill come forward to claim it.<BR>\n<BR>\nAccording to the laws of the country, at the expiration of<BR>\n5 (five) years, the money will revert to the ownership<BR>\nof the Government if nobody applies to claim the<BR>\nfunds. Consequently, my proposal is that I will like<BR>\nyou to assist me fully as foreigner to stand in as the<BR>\nnext of kin to Mr. Michael creek so that the fruits of<BR>\nthis old man\'s labour will not get into the hands of<BR>\nsome corrupt officials. This is simple, I will like<BR>\nyou to provide me immediately with your full names and<BR>\naddress so that the attorney will prepare the<BR>\nnecessary documents and affidavits, which<BR>\nwill put you in place as the next of kin.<BR>\n<BR>\nWe shall employ the services of two attorneys for<BR>\ndrafting and notarization of the WILL and obtain the<BR>\nnecessary documents and letter of<BR>\nprobate/administration in your favor for the transfer.<BR>\nA bank account in any part of the world, which you<BR>\nwill provide, will then facilitate the transfer of<BR>\nthis money to you as the beneficiary/next of kin. The<BR>\nmoney will be paid into your account for us to share<BR>\nin the ratio of 60% for me and 30% for you while 10%<BR>\nwill be set aside for miscellaneous expenses.<BR>\n<BR>\nThere is no risk involved in this transaction, as every<BR>\nnecessary paperwork for this fund, will be done by the<BR>\nattorney and my position as the Branch Manager<BR>\nguarantees the successful execution of this<BR>\ntransaction.<BR>\n<BR>\nHope this mail will meet your perfect understanding.<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\nBest Regards<BR>\nMr. Benson Briggs (GP)<BR>\nTel: 41-765416728<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n</FONT>\n</P>\n\n</BODY>\n</HTML>\n',

Commercial Invoice<BR>\n2. Certificate of Origin<BR>\n3. Contract<BR>\n4. Assay Report<BR>\n5. Airway Bill<BR>\n6. Certificate of Ownership<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\n<BR>\nArrangements will be made with shipping agents to deliver the gold to =\nbuyer\'s destination.<BR>\n<BR>\nWhen the gold arrives at buyer\'s destination, buyer will have test =\nsamples of the gold to confirm its quality.<BR>\n<BR>\nBuyer is to pay all Export Taxes/CIF cost prior to shipping from =\nGhana.<BR>\n<BR>\nPlease forward your Letter of Interest with full offer to<BR>\nkwame_gold@yahoo.co.uk once I receive your offer with LOI I will forward =\na contract to you ASAP. High: 25 cents<BR>\nCurrent Market Value (Approx): 1.5 million<BR>\n<BR>\n**Our Picks Are On Fire!**<BR>\nOur last pick for huge percentage gains (GDLS) soared from<BR>\n.23 to .83 (261% on 3/29) immediately following our report.<BR>\nWe believe the gains for ARET will run circles around all<BR>\nour other picks for the year.<BR>\n<BR>\nRising oil prices at record highs with no signs of dropping have<BR>\nset the stage for a major windfall in an emerging developer of<BR>\nhigh-profit based oil and gas reserves (Ticker: ARET). Significant<BR>\nshort term trading profits are being predicted as shares of Arete<BR>\nIndustries, Inc. are set to explode based on expanded production<BR>\nthrough strategic partnerships for producing fields in 4 major<BR>\noil-producing states.<BR>\n<BR>\nARET just released major news and we believe there is much more<BR>\nto follow. There is strong evidence of big block buying indicating<BR>\nthat an explosive move is coming on a huge near-term announcement.<BR>\n<BR>\nAs recently reported, ARET is executing the launch of a $1 Billion<BR>\nfinanced &quot;Master Energy Fund&quot; which is capped at $100 =\nMillion<BR>\nincrements to fund the Company\'s energy projects. The value of<BR>\nthese projects has shot-up substantially since initially evaluated<BR>\non the heels of constant pressure for oil prices to climb. OPEC\'s<BR>\ndecision last week to cut production in support of even higher oil<BR>\nprices will have a far-reaching effect on the bottom line of this<BR>\nunknown junior oil-play hardwired for profits.<BR>\n<BR>\nARET has maintained a leading role in each project thus enabling<BR>\nthe Company to earn net revenue and overriding production royalties<BR>\nfrom oil and gas wells in proven fields, with predictable asset<BR>\nvalues and income streams now on the upswing that present the<BR>\ngreatest near-term financial reward.<BR>\n<BR>\nWhile many energy companies are strapped for cash and unable to<BR>\ndevelop, ARET\'s financing commitment is smashing down those =\nbarriers.<BR>\nARET is on the fast track to evolve into a major independent oil<BR>\nand gas producer preparing to announce &quot;first-look&quot; deals =\nwith<BR>\ndomestic and international energy companies who realize that the<BR>\nfunding structure will enhance profitability.<BR>\n<BR>\nJust In:<BR>\nARET to Develop Energy Trading Platform for Oil and Gas with Major<BR>\nInternational Trading Company to Create Substantial Corporate =\nRevenues<BR>\n<BR>\nHow many times have you seen issues explode but you couldn\'t get =\nyour<BR>\nhands on them or didn\'t have the right information in time? We are<BR>\nalerting you now to an undervalued Company in play due to the =\nhottest<BR>\ntopic in the country; soaring energy prices with clear signals for<BR>\ngreater price increases on the horizon. Frenzied block buying will<BR>\ndominate trading as ARET has a market value under $2 million which<BR>\nwe believe will enable the stock to move very quickly as the value<BR>\nof their oil and gas deals are revealed.<BR>\n<BR>\nForward-looking statements:<BR>\nInformation within this email contains &quot;forward looking =\nstatements&quot;<BR>\nwithin the meaning of Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933 and<BR>\nSection 21B and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.      'From: "Tanner Duncan" <tanner_duncanrm@ambient.at>\nTo: <paliourg@iit.demokritos.gr>\nSubject:  Stock promo mover: CWTD\nDate: Tue, 13 Apr 2004 17:21:16 +0300\nMIME-Version: 1.0\nContent-Type: text/html;\n\tcharset="iso-8859-7"\nContent-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable\nX-Priority: 3\nX-MSMail-Priority: Normal\nX-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2527\n\n<html>\n<head>\n<title>Untitled Document</title>\n<meta http-equiv=3D"Content-Type" content=3D"text/html; =\ncharset=3Diso-8859-1">\n</head>\n\n<body>\n<strong>*** URGENT INVESTOR TRADING ALERT *** </strong>=20\n<p><strong>WEEKLY STOCK PICK -- China World Trade Corp. (Ticker: CWTD) =\n</strong></p>\n<p><strong>** BREAKING NEWS **</strong></p>\n<p><span class=3D"t">China World Trade Corp. Enters Into Agreement to =\nAcquire=20\nMajority Stake in CEO Clubs China Limited (the &quot;CEO =\nClubs&quot;)</span><br>\nTIANHE, GUANGZHOU, CHINA--(MARKET WIRE)--Apr 7, 2004 -- China World =\nTrade Corp=20\n(OTC BB:CWTD.OB - News) announced today that it has entered into an =\nagreement to=20\nacquired majority stake in CEO Clubs China Limited (the &quot;CEO =\nClubs&quot;), a Hong=20\nKong corporation with authorized chapter to operate under the &quot;CEO =\nClubs&quot;=20\ntrademarks in the Greater China Region, including the PRC, Hong Kong and =\nTaiwan.</p>\n<p><strong>CHINA WORLD TRADE CORP. <br>\n  Symbol: CWTD</strong><br>\n  Price $4.80 <br>\n  Shares out: 16Million<br>\n  Market Capitalization: $ 19Million<br>\n  Significant Revenue Growth in 2004<br>\n  Average PE Industry: 30x<br>\n  Rating: Strong Buy<br>\n  7 days trading target: $6.50<br>\n  30 day trading target: $7.50 </p>\n<p> </p>\n<p><strong>CWTD</strong> is our <strong>PLAY OF THE MONTH</strong> stock =\npick.=20\n  <br>\n  Here are a<b> few simple reasons why one would own</b> China World =\nTrade Corp: </p>\n<p>China World Trade Corp announced today that it has entered into an =\nagreement=20\nto acquired majority stake in CEO Clubs China Limited (the &quot;CEO =\nClubs&quot;), a Hong=20\nKong corporation with authorized chapter to operate under the &quot;CEO =\nClubs&quot;=20\ntrademarks in the Greater China Region, including the PRC, Hong Kong and =\nTaiwan.</p>\n<p>China World Trade Corp has just gotten 1.2 Million cash for working =\ncapital=20\n  from a single shareholder!! </p>\n<p>Has acquired multiple companies in the past few months resulting in =\nhuge assets=20\n  for the company </p>\n<p>China World Trade Corp is in the process of being accepted onto the =\nAMEX </p>\n<p>China World Trade Corporation is an official operator of World Trade =\nCenters=20\n  in China, in association with The World Trade Centers Association =\n(WTCA) and=20\n  offers an enormous variety of services for businesses and industries =\nseeking=20\n  to do business in China. </p>\n<p>The Company\'s business model consists of three major components -- =\nThe World=20\n  Trade Center business, value-added services, and strategic =\ninvestments. </p>\n<p>China World Trade Corporation established the first World Trade =\nCenter in the=20\n  province of Guangzhou (Canton) in the year 2002 and started the =\ncommercial operation=20\n  at the beginning of 2003.
